description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a simple shooter game.  The goal is to shoot down various aircraft and the objects dropped by them. There are multiple levels with a story line.  The game was conceived and initially written by a 4th grade student, and ported to XNA (with help from Dad) when he was in 5th grade.  All game design, artwork, and the storyline were done by him.
